name: Death Defiance (shaZain)
description:
LORE

This story revolves around the scroll of death, an object so powerful and mysterious wherein lies the secret of death, resurrection and immortality. This scroll was in a world that was home to beasts, creatures that no longer could stay on the realm of living and there were special guards to protect the scroll from ever leaving the palace, also known as the Palace of Dea Tacita.

It was forbidden to come close or touch the scroll of death as it targets the minds of weak and test them if they have what it takes to claim it’s power. One of the guards Cleophas encountered the scroll, he could not pass the tests laid by the scroll and was consumed in front of his brother Elias, contained within the scroll. The only way to resurrect his brother would be to encounter the scroll, pass all its tests, take it out of the palace and return it to realm of living. It has the power of immortality, so anyone touching it will not die unless consumed by the scroll in its tests.

The scroll will test your mind and body by puzzles, there is no time limit but the longer you stay there, the easier for your mind to be shattered, but as many times as you die, you will come back again. Bring back the scroll of death as quickly as you can!

 

Description

A 2d puzzle platformer where death is not the end but rather it’s the answer. In a world overrun by beasts, you must past the tests to achieve the power that comes from the Scroll of Death.
